# 表单必填无法提示到具体字段

`unconfirmed`

### Reproduction link

[https://4x.ant.design/components/form/#validateMessages](https://4x.ant.design/components/form/#validateMessages)

### Steps to reproduce

表单提交进行必填校验

### What is expected?

控制台打印具体某个字段未填写

### What is actually happening?

['请输入${label}']

| ----------- | -------- |
| antd        | 4.24.8   |
| React       | react16  |
| System      | window11 |
| Browser     | 谷歌     |
